Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at Stony/71st
ShortDescription: 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via: Stony, 73rd. Jeffery, 67th and Stony, due to, street blockage, near Stony/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Stony, 73rd. Jeffery, 67th and Stony, due to, street blockage, near Stony/71st.

Allow extra travel time.
